title: Media companies will find opportunity and threat in AI
description: The defining theme of 2026 will be how media companies respond to AI — both the opportunities and the disruptive threats. Opportunities 1. Increased newsroom efficiency by transforming how journalism is packaged together — text, photography, video, graphics, related stories — moving from multiple teams to a bilateral relationship between reporter and editor, with the...
